english_example_sentence: When we support good ideas, people appreciate it.
russian_example_sentence: Когда мы поддерживаем хорошие идеи, люди это ценят.
turkish_example_sentence: İyi fikirleri desteklediğimizde, insanlar bunu takdir eder.
